flavorText.text:
もりや　はやしに　おおく　ぶんぷ。
ちじょうでも　はげしく　はばたいて
すなを　かけたりする。

たたかいを　このまない　おとなしい
せいかくだが　へたに　てを　だすと
きょうれつに　はんげきされるぞ。

ほうこう　かんかくに　とても　すぐれているので
どんなに　はなれた　ばしょからでも　まよわずに
じぶんの　す　まで　かえる　ことが　できる。

ほうこう　かんかくに　とても　すぐれているので
どんなに　はなれた　ばしょからでも　まよわずに
じぶんの　す　まで　かえる　ことが　できる。

おとなしい　せいかくで　おそわれても
はんげき　せずに　すなを　かけて
みを　まもることが　おおい。

おとなしい　せいかくで　おそわれても
はんげき　せずに　すなを　かけて
みを　まもることが　おおい。

숲이나 수풀에 많이 분포해 있다.
땅에서도 격렬한 날갯짓으로
모래를 뿌리기도 한다.

싸움을 좋아하지 않는 얌전한
성격이지만 어설프게 건드리면
강력한 반격을 당하게 된다.

방향 감각이 매우 뛰어나서
아무리 멀리 떨어진 곳에서도 헤매지 않고
자신의 둥지까지 찾아 돌아올 수 있다.

방향 감각이 매우 뛰어나서
아무리 멀리 떨어진 곳에서도 헤매지 않고
자신의 둥지까지 찾아 돌아올 수 있다.

얌전한 성격이라 습격당해도
반격하지 않고 모래를 뿌려서
몸을 지키는 경우가 많다.

얌전한 성격이라 습격당해도
반격하지 않고 모래를 뿌려서
몸을 지키는 경우가 많다.

性情溫馴，即使遭到襲擊
也很少反擊，只會朝對手
潑沙子來保護自己。

性情溫馴，即使遭到襲擊
也很少反擊，只會朝對手
潑沙子來保護自己。

Ce Pokémon docile préfère éviter
le combat. Toutefois, il se montre
très féroce quand on l’agresse.

Ce Pokémon docile préfère éviter
le combat. Toutefois, il se montre
très féroce quand on l’agresse.

On l’aperçoit souvent dans les forêts. Avec ses ailes,
il brasse l’air près du sol pour projeter du sable.

Ce Pokémon docile préfère éviter le combat.
Toutefois, il se montre très féroce quand on l’agresse.

Roucool a un excellent sens de l’orientation. Il est capable de
retrouver son nid sans jamais se tromper, même s’il est très
loin de chez lui et dans un environnement qu’il ne connaît pas.

Roucool a un excellent sens de l’orientation. Il est capable de
retrouver son nid sans jamais se tromper, même s’il est très
loin de chez lui et dans un environnement qu’il ne connaît pas.

De nature très docile, il préfère projeter
du sable pour se défendre plutôt que
contre-attaquer.

De nature très docile, il préfère projeter
du sable pour se défendre plutôt que
contre-attaquer.

Ein vorwiegend in Wäldern lebendes Pokémon,
das zur Verteidigung mit den Flügeln Sand aufwirbelt.

Reizt man dieses an sich gutmütige Pokémon,
wehrt es sich wütend.

Taubsi verfügt über einen sehr geschulten Orientierungssinn.
Es kehrt zielsicher zu seinem Nest zurück, egal, wie weit es
sich von seiner gewohnten Umgebung entfernt hat.

Taubsi verfügt über einen sehr geschulten Orientierungssinn.
Es kehrt zielsicher zu seinem Nest zurück, egal, wie weit es
sich von seiner gewohnten Umgebung entfernt hat.

Ein sanftmütiges Pokémon, welches lieber Sand
zum Schutz aufwirbelt, als zurückzuschlagen.

Ein sanftmütiges Pokémon, welches lieber Sand
zum Schutz aufwirbelt, als zurückzuschlagen.

Muy común en bosques y selvas. Aletea al nivel del
suelo para levantar la gravilla.

Es manso y prefiere evitar los problemas. Sin embargo,
si le molestan atacará ferozmente.

Pidgey tiene un sentido de la orientación muy desarrollado.
Es capaz de regresar a su nido, por lejos que se encuentre
de las zonas que le resultan familiares.

Pidgey tiene un sentido de la orientación muy desarrollado.
Es capaz de regresar a su nido, por lejos que se encuentre
de las zonas que le resultan familiares.

Su docilidad es tal que suelen defenderse
levantando arena en lugar de contraatacar.

Su docilidad es tal que suelen defenderse
levantando arena en lugar de contraatacar.

Molto comune in boschi e foreste, sbatte le ali a
livello del suolo per sollevare sabbia accecante.

È docile e preferisce evitare i conflitti. Ma se viene
disturbato, contrattacca ferocemente.

Pidgey ha un senso dell’orientamento molto sviluppato.
È sempre in grado di ritornare al suo nido, anche quando
si spinge molto lontano dal suo ambiente abituale.

Pidgey ha un senso dell’orientamento molto sviluppato.
È sempre in grado di ritornare al suo nido, anche quando
si spinge molto lontano dal suo ambiente abituale.

Di indole docile, preferisce gettare sabbia
verso il nemico per proteggersi piuttosto
che attaccarlo.

Di indole docile, preferisce gettare sabbia
verso il nemico per proteggersi piuttosto
che attaccarlo.

A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

Very docile. If
attacked, it will
often kick up sand to protect
itself rather
than fight back.

It usually hides
in tall grass. Be­
cause it dislikes fighting, it pro­
tects itself by
kicking up sand.

Common in grassy
areas and forests,
it is very docile and will chase off
enemies by flap­
ping up sand.

It rapidly flaps
its wings in the
grass, stirring up a dust cloud that
drives insect prey
out into the open.

PIDGEY has an extremely sharp sense
of direction.
It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be
removed from its familiar surroundings.

PIDGEY has an extremely sharp sense
of direction.
It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be
removed from its familiar surroundings.

It has an extremely sharp sense of
direction. It can unerringly return home to
its nest, however far it may be removed
from its familiar surroundings.

Does not like to fight. It hides in
tall grass and so on, foraging for food
such as small bugs.

A common sight in forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground level to kick
up blinding sand.

It is docile and prefers to avoid
conflict. If disturbed, however,
it can ferociously strike back.

It is docile and prefers to avoid
conflict. If disturbed, however,
it can ferociously strike back.

It is docile and prefers to avoid
conflict. If disturbed, however,
it can ferociously strike back.

It usually hides in tall grass.
Because it dislikes fighting,
it protects itself by kicking up sand.

Common in grassy areas and forests,
it is very docile and will chase off
enemies by flapping up sand.

It is docile and prefers to avoid
conflict. If disturbed, however,
it can ferociously strike back.

It is docile and prefers to avoid
conflict. If disturbed, however,
it can ferociously strike back.

It is docile and prefers to avoid
conflict. If disturbed, however,
it can ferociously strike back.

It is docile and prefers to avoid
conflict. If disturbed, however,

A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps
its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict.
If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It is capable
of unerringly returning home to its nest, however far it may be
removed from its familiar surroundings.

Pidgey has an extremely sharp sense of direction.
It is capable of unerringly returning home to its nest,
however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up
sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up
sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

性格沉着冷静，即使受到
攻击也很少反击，只会朝
对手扬起沙子保护自己。
